projects.name: Network Management System
projects.description: BEL NMS is an integrated management application with configurable components, developed indigenously, to meet the specific requirements of Static and Tactical Networks. It supports FCAPS functionality for any kind of network to be managed. NMS components are customizable to manage, configure and monitor networks consisting of IP and Non-IP devices. It offers a common platform to troubleshoot network problems, command & control support to the higher echelons.
